import React, { useState } from 'react' import FormNotification from '../components/FormNotification' const handleUpdateProduct = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const product = { name: e.target[0].value, description: e.target[1].value, price: e.target[2].value, category: e.target[3].value, tag: e.target[4].value, imageName: e.target[5].value, rating: e.target[6].value } console.log(product) const result = await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/products/update`, { method: 'put', headers: { 'Content-type': 'application/json', 'authorization': `Bearer ${localStorage.getItem('accessToken')}` }, body: JSON.stringify(product) }) const data = await result.json() console.log(data) return ( <>
{updateProduct ? () : (<>)} {updateFailed ? () : (<>)}

Product name

Description

Price

Category

Tag

Image name

Rating, 1-5

) } export default UpdateProductSection
